+/*
+ * @test
+ * @bug 8345438
+ * @summary Verify 'return' allowed in a lambda declared in an early construction context
+ * @enablePreview
+ */
+public class EarlyLambdaReturn {
+
+    public EarlyLambdaReturn() {
+        Runnable r = () -> {
+            return;
+        };
+        super();
+        r.run();
+    }
+
+    public static void main(String[] args) {
+        new EarlyLambdaReturn();
+    }
+}
